mapper.select: select areano, areanm, cnt from ( select a.areano, a.areanm, b.cnt from areatb a inner join ( select areano, count(areano) as cnt from theatertb group by areano ) b on (a.areano = b.areano) ) as a order by areano

with recursive daterange as ( select date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as date union all select date_add(date, interval 1 day) from daterange where date_add(date, interval 1 day) <= last_day(date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-01')) ) select date, day, weekday, concat(date_format((date), '%y.%m.%d'), '(', weekday ,')') as txt from ( select date, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%d') AS day, CASE DAYOFWEEK(date) WHEN 1 THEN '일' WHEN 2 THEN '월' WHEN 3 THEN '화' WHEN 4 THEN '수' WHEN 5 THEN '목' WHEN 6 THEN '금' WHEN 7 THEN '토' END AS weekday from daterange ) as a
order by date
